markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lich Dust](/Equipment.aspx?ID=121)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 552 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 110 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Dust salvaged from the remains of a destroyed [lich](/Monsters.aspx?ID=282) has paralytic properties that make it a valuable poison.

**Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) (1 minute); **Stage 2** 5d6 poison damage and fatigued (1 minute); **Stage 3** 5d6 poison damage, fatigued, and [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Lich Dust
